Inline_array_size_mismatch

Ubuntu 24.04.2 LTS - Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700K CPU @ 4.00GHz

OpenGL
GL info
NVIDIA Corporation - NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070-PCIe-SSE2 - 4.0.0 NVIDIA 570.124.06
GLSL version
4.00 NVIDIA via Cg compiler
Description
Verifies that using an NV097_INLINE_ARRAY draw loop that ends with a partial vertex description silently ignores any partial vertices.
See xemu#985
Suite class def
src/tests/inline_array_size_mismatch.h
